languages.text: {n}В ледяной тишине — серия поразительно объемных воспоминаний. Вы не одни, никогда не были одни. Оно таилось в вашей тени, в вашей крови, в вас самих.{/n} "...Да, {name}. Имя этому необыкновенному везению — Предел рассвета. Если бы не мой неусыпный взор, твое сознание уже давно слилось бы с печальным сонмом ушедших. Я сохранил его целостным и невредимым — не мог допустить, чтобы столь яркую судьбу погубила какая-то нелепость. Но порой я начинаю задумываться — а стоит ли она моей протекции?"

{n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"
languages.original_text: {n}В ледяной тишине — серия поразительно объемных воспоминаний. Вы не одни, никогда не были одни. Оно таилось в вашей тени, в вашей крови, в вас самих.{/n} "...Да, {name}. Имя этому необыкновенному везению — Предел рассвета. Если бы не мой неусыпный взор, твое сознание уже давно слилось бы с печальным сонмом ушедших. languages.text: {n}In der eisigen Stille ereilen dich einige unglaubliche lebensnahe Erinnerungen. Du bist nicht allein und warst es auch nie. Es war immer da, in deinem Schatten, in deinem Blut, in dir.{/n}"... Ja, {name}. Dieses Glück wird als Rand des Tagesanbruchs bezeichnet. Ohne meinen schlaflosen Blick hätte sich Euer Verstand längst der schwermütigen Schar all jener angeschlossen, die nicht mehr sind. Ich war es, der Euch beschützt hat, denn ich konnte nicht zulassen, dass ein so strahlendes Schicksal irgendeiner Absurdität zum Opfer fällt. Aber ab und an frage ich mich: Ist es meines Schutzes würdig?"
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"

Aber ab und an frage ich mich: Ist es meines Schutzes würdig?"

languages.text: {n}Buz gibi sessizliğin ortasında, inanılmaz derecede gerçekçi bir dizi anıyla sarsılıyorsun. Yalnız değilsin, hiçbir zaman da olmadın. O hep oradaydı; gölgende, kanında, içinde.{/n} "Evet {name}. Bu fırsatın adı Tan Vakti. Uykusuz bakışlarım olmasa zihnin, artık olmayanların kederli konakçısına katılmış olurdu. Onu bütün ve korunaklı hâlde tutan bendim. Böylesine parlak bir kaderin, talihsizliğe uğramasına izin veremezdim. Ancak zaman zaman merak ediyorum... Benim korumama layık mı bu?"
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Buz gibi sessizliğin ortasında, inanılmaz derecede gerçekçi bir dizi anıyla sarsılıyorsun. Yalnız değilsin, hiçbir zaman da olmadın. O hep oradaydı; gölgende, kanında, içinde.{/n} "Evet {name}. Bu fırsatın adı Tan Vakti. Uykusuz bakışlarım olmasa zihnin, artık olmayanların kederli konakçısına katılmış olurdu. Onu bütün ve korunaklı hâlde tutan bendim. Böylesine parlak bir kaderin, talihsizliğe uğramasına izin veremezdim. Ancak zaman zaman merak ediyorum... Benim korumama layık mı bu?"

languages.text: {n}Dans le silence de glace, vous êtes soudainement {mf|assailli|assaillie} par une succession de souvenirs frappants de réalisme. Vous n'êtes pas {mf|seul|seule} et vous ne l'avez jamais été. Il a toujours été là, dans votre ombre, dans votre sang... en vous.{/n} « ... Oui, {name}. Cette chance porte un nom : la Lame de l'Aube. Sans mon regard éternel et sans faille, votre esprit aurait rejoint depuis longtemps l'hôte sinistre de ceux qui ne sont plus. Si vous êtes encore indemne aujourd'hui, c'est grâce à moi. Je ne pouvais pas laisser une destinée aussi radiante que la vôtre succomber à une absurdité. Mais parfois, je m'interroge : mérite-t-elle vraiment ma protection ? »
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans le silence de glace, vous êtes soudainement {mf|assailli|assaillie} par une succession de souvenirs frappants de réalisme. Vous n'êtes pas {mf|seul|seule} et vous ne l'avez jamais été. Il a toujours été là, dans votre ombre, dans votre sang... en vous.{/n} « ... Oui, {name}. Cette chance porte un nom : la Lame de l'Aube. Sans mon regard éternel et sans faille, votre esprit aurait rejoint depuis longtemps l'hôte sinistre de ceux qui ne sont plus. Si vous êtes encore indemne aujourd'hui, c'est grâce à moi. Je ne pouvais pas laisser une destinée aussi radiante que la vôtre succomber à une absurdité. Mais parfois, je m'interroge : mérite-t-elle vraiment ma protection ? »

languages.text: {n}En el gélido silencio te sobreviene un aluvión de recuerdos increíblemente vívidos. No estás {mf|solo|sola}; nunca lo estuviste. Siempre ha estado ahí, en tu sombra, en tu sangre, dentro de ti.{/n} «Sí, {name}. El nombre de esa suerte es el Filo del Amanecer. De no haber estado yo velando por ti, hace mucho que tu mente se habría unido a la infausta legión de los ausentes. Fui yo quien la mantuvo entera e ilesa, pues no podía consentir que un destino tan brillante como el tuyo acabase de un modo tan absurdo. Pero en ocasiones me pregunto si es digna de mi protección».
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"

traits.locale_text: {n}En el gélido silencio te sobreviene un aluvión de recuerdos increíblemente vívidos. No estás {mf|solo|sola}; nunca lo estuviste. Siempre ha estado ahí, en tu sombra, en tu sangre, dentro de ti.{/n} «Sí, {name}. El nombre de esa suerte es el Filo del Amanecer. De no haber estado yo velando por ti, hace mucho que tu mente se habría unido a la infausta legión de los ausentes. Fui yo quien la mantuvo entera e ilesa, pues no podía consentir que un destino tan brillante como el tuyo acabase de un modo tan absurdo. Pero en ocasiones me pregunto si es digna de mi protección».

languages.text: {n}在冰冷的寂静之中，你惊讶地发现脑海中充满了栩栩如生的回忆，它们真实得令人难以置信。你并不是孤身一人，从来都不是。它始终与你同在，在你的影子里、你的血脉中、你的灵魂深处。{/n}“……没错，{name}。这并不是单纯的好运，而是破晓锋刃的守护。若不是我不眠不休地守望着你，你的灵魂恐怕早就加入了已逝之人悲苦的合唱。是我守护着你，让你的灵魂完好无损，因为我决不能容忍如此光辉灿烂的命运沦为荒诞的玩物。不过偶尔，我也不禁会怀疑，这一切真的值得我守护吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"

traits.locale_text: {n}在冰冷的寂静之中，你惊讶地发现脑海中充满了栩栩如生的回忆，它们真实得令人难以置信。你并不是孤身一人，从来都不是。它始终与你同在，在你的影子里、你的血脉中、你的灵魂深处。{/n}“……没错，{name}。这并不是单纯的好运，而是破晓锋刃的守护。若不是我不眠不休地守望着你，你的灵魂恐怕早就加入了已逝之人悲苦的合唱。是我守护着你，让你的灵魂完好无损，因为我决不能容忍如此光辉灿烂的命运沦为荒诞的玩物。不过偶尔，我也不禁会怀疑，这一切真的值得我守护吗？”

languages.text: {n}氷のような静寂の中で、あなたは非常に生々しい一連の記憶に襲われた。昔も今も、あなたは一人ではなかった。それは常にあなたの影の中に、あなたの血の中に、あなたの中にあったのだ。{/n}「…そうだ、{name}。この幸運は『暁の刃』と名付けられている。もし私の眠らぬ視線がなければ、お前の心はとっくに、もはや存在しない哀れな者たちの群れに加わっていただろう。私こそが、それを完全かつ無傷に保ってきたのだ。あまりにも輝かしい運命が、些細な愚かさに陥ることを許せなかったからだ。しかし時折、私は疑問に思う。果たしてそれは、私の守護に値するものなのか、と」
languages.original_text: {n}In the icy silence, you are struck with a series of incredibly lifelike recollections. You are not alone, and you never were. It was always there, in your shadow, in your blood, inside you.{/n} "...Yes, {name}. This luck is named the Edge of Daybreak. Had it not been for my sleepless gaze, your mind would have long since joined the mournful host of those who are no more. It was I who kept it whole and unharmed, for I could not allow such a radiant destiny to fall to some absurdity. But at times, I do wonder: is it worthy of my protection?"
